ygData.subject: Out of the Dark came an awesome sound.
ygData.msgSnippet: A large object hurtled at top speed toward the Cybertronian Fire, A large red Dragon arrived answering the call to duty. he roared as he saw the raging battle.

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

A large object hurtled at top speed toward the Cybertronian Fire, A large
red Dragon arrived answering the call to duty. he roared as he saw the
raging battle. The ground was once again scorched and stained with the mech
fluid from the various wounded bots. Answering an earlier distress call from
an unknown bot he raced in for the rescue. He found the source of the
communication holding himself up facing off against Mobster.(The call was
Razor Claws request for reinforcements) Necromancer yelled, trying to be
heard above the battle, "Leave the microbot be and try someone a little
bigger." With his brave words he  launched five fireballs at Mobster hoping
to force him away from the injured bot.
